name: Celestial Vanguard
description:
CONTROLS:
F11 for fullscreen (recommended)
WASD Keys to move
Left Click to basic attack
Right Click to special attack

Celestial Vanguard is an action-packed, fast-paced space adventure! You play as a final defender of the human race, who must defeat an enemy space fleet in order to save the remaining survivors. You earn money by taking different missions including combat and mining. Using this money. you can purchase upgrades in order to improve your spaceship’s defenses, weapons, and attack capabilities. There are three different weapons and two different special abilities to unlock.
